name: Meat (FieryDashes)
description:
This is Meat. A game that plays off in a dream world, with tension build up and then a crash like a wave. You will have a pun of a time. Prepare to be marinated in suspense. Okay I will stop.

This is my first try at making a game with some sort of story or meaning. I hope you enjoy the experience.

Please leave a comment of critique or questions.

Follow me on Instagram @FieryDashes for updates on future games.

                               Twitter       @DashesFiery 

Credits: 

Sounds and Music: https://sonniss.com and their free game audio bundles.
